title: How can an illustrator hire a writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: By typing ‘freelance illustrator’ in the google search box and then press ‘images’. You will then see loads of illustrations, click on the ones you like and visit their website and call them. Don’t use recruiters, they will charge a big fee for doing a lot of nothing. Most good illustrators should be on page one of Google and don’t use recruiters.
